### Description

Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada is looking to obtain a study guide that provides useful information about Canada’s immigration policies and culture for newcomers who will use it to prepare for their citizenship test. The study guide is expected to be comprehensive and engaging to ensure a thorough understanding of Canadian society and values. The services required will involve the creation and delivery of the study guide within a specified timeframe. In return, the Department of Public Works and Government Services will provide the necessary funding. The study guide will be used by newcomers to Canada to prepare for their citizenship test. 

There is no * bs, amendments, attachments, an no Specialty codes. The brightest bid will win. The deepest pockets need not apply since Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada has set out its standards long ago
